about_the_game:
"Last Stand:Defense" is a rogue-like tower defense game. You will play a person who wakes up in the end of the world, rebuild the city on this apocalyptic road, fight against aliens, and restore the glory of mankind in the past.

The alien species invaded, and the world suffered a heavy blow. The physical gap between humans and alien species was too great. People who realized that they had no chance of winning finally activated the Fire Plan-letting some humans sleep in the "room" underground, and using genetic weapons to carry out a devastating attack on the alien species on the ground.

Hundreds of years later, you wake up and return to the earth, waking up in the wilderness, but unfortunately, you find that the aliens are not extinct, but the genetic weapons have indeed caused heavy damage to them, and humans have also evolved during this long period of time.

Every night, this group of damn aliens will come back and try to invade your homeland. Build buildings, recruit soldiers, kill this group of aliens outside the city wall, and try to survive. You are the last fire of mankind.

Build-Command-Empower-Evolve:

Build - Diverse types of buildings. Try to control more economy, expand your territory, master higher-end technology, and build more powerful buildings to prevent the upcoming enemies while ensuring the safety of the main base.

Command - Build more barracks to accommodate more soldiers and arms of different abilities. There are five different types of arms, and each type has three variants. Match your army and command them on the battlefield to defeat the aliens.

Empower - Add some magic to your buildings to give them new functions, but be careful, this magic is not unlimited.

Evolution - Join the glorious evolution and become stronger in battle! Every victory in battle will gain a new ability that can strengthen your heroes, soldiers and even buildings, making your forces stronger and stronger.

[/p]
